review.title: “Bodhbridge - best company for students and freshers”
review.pros: Pros – Good compensation for freshers.Really good working environment.Always they are ready to accept new ideas.Young company so lot of growth.Learning experiences is huge
review.cons: Cons – Since Its a young company your job roles are not exact.you may need to do some other work also. other benefits are less.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Just continue to grow.Interns are our strength.So use them maximum.Lot of people have less work so keep them engaged in other works.
